resources.string: I\'m tracking my time with Time = Money! #timeismoney http://goo.gl/1uws1
Just wasted %1$s over %2$s just on my own! #timeismoney http://goo.gl/1uws1

plurals.name: share_custom_text
plurals.item: Just wasted %1$s over %2$s with a chum! #timeismoney http://goo.gl/1uws1
Just wasted %1$s over %2$s with %3$d chums! #timeismoney http://goo.gl/1uws1

resources.string:
Time=Money! is an app to calculate how much time you and your friends/co-workers are wasting based on a certain hourly rate. Just put in your hourly rate, tap Go!, and adjust as time passes.

Developed by
Doom on a Fireball Studios

This app is open source and available on GitHub!

Version:
